/projects/ijn/aichid3a/akagid3aflight/.title: Aichi D3A1 from Akagi
/projects/ijn/aichid3a/akagid3aflight/.summary: An Aichi D3A1 Val dive bomber attack launched from the Akagi. Featuring kits from Airfix and ZTS Plastyk in 1:72

/notebook/retailers/tokyo/.title: Tokyo Model Stores
/notebook/retailers/tokyo/.summary: Reviewing the best model stores in Tokyo

/projects/raf/homecoming/.title: Homecoming
/projects/raf/homecoming/.summary: A little vignette featuring figures from ICM and a Lancaster and Spitfires from Pit-Road.

/projects/raf/lordflasheart/.title: Squadron Commander Lord Flasheart
/projects/raf/lordflasheart/.summary: Woof! The legend of Squadron Leader The Lord Flasheart. An Elan13 Miniatures bust with a Fokker Dr.1 from Airfix.

/projects/raf/bristol/f2b/f2bin72/.title: Bristol F.2b
/projects/raf/bristol/f2b/f2bin72/.summary: Building the Bristol F.2b in 1:72 scale. This is the venerable Airfix Vintage Classic from 1957!

/projects/germany/fokker/dr1/.title: Fokker Dr.I
/projects/germany/fokker/dr1/.summary: Building the Fokker Dr.I (intended for another diorama). This is the venerable Airfix Vintage Classic from 1957!

/projects/ukraine/zaporizhzhia/.title: Foxtrot-class Zaporizhzhia
/projects/ukraine/zaporizhzhia/.summary: MikroMir have made a very good kit of the Foxtrot-class Zaporizhzhia. The build went well, but my attempt to encase it in resin was a catastrophic failure☹ One day I'll try this again, but in the spirit of sharing failures as well as successes: here's the gory story of what went wrong!

/projects/royalnavy/navalmineremoval/.title: Naval Mine Removal
/projects/royalnavy/navalmineremoval/.summary: Members of the Mine Recovery and Disposal Squad towing away a naval mine from the beach at Tayport with the aid of a Bren gun carrier being operated by troops of the 1st Polish Corps. Features the Airfix Bren Gun Carrier and figures from Germania Figuren.

/projects/ijn/kyushu/j7w1/.title: Kyushu J7W1
/projects/ijn/kyushu/j7w1/.summary: Building the Kyūshū J7W Shinden 震電, as used by Kōichi Shikishima in Godzilla Minus One to deliver the final fatal blow. No electronics in this one.

/projects/ijn/mitsubishig3m/g3m3model23/.title: Mitsubishi G3M3 Nell
/projects/ijn/mitsubishig3m/g3m3model23/.summary: Building the Mitsubishi G3M3 Nell from Hasegawa in 1:72, motorized and mounted in-flight for the #risingsungb.

/projects/raf/gloster/meteorfr9/.title: Gloster Meteor FR.9
/projects/raf/gloster/meteorfr9/.summary: Building the 1:72 Airfix 2022 tooling of the Gloster Meteor FR.9. No electronics in this one.

/projects/ijn/kamikawamaru/.title: IJN Seaplane Tender Kamikawa Maru
/projects/ijn/kamikawamaru/.summary: Depicting the brief establishment of a seaplane base at Deboyne in 1942 by the IJN Seaplane Tender Kamikawa Maru and a supporting force.

/projects/ijn/jintsu/.title: IJN Cruiser Jintsū
/projects/ijn/jintsu/.summary: Building the Fujimi 1:700 kit of the IJN Cruiser Jintsū (神通) (じんつう)

/projects/raf/typhoon/mkib_dday/.title: Hawker Typhoon Mk.Ib on D-Day
/projects/raf/typhoon/mkib_dday/.summary: Typhoon Ib on ground attack over France 1944. Just a quick build of the nice little Airfix 1:72 kit while other projects drag along on the bench!

/projects/ija/type97/malaya1941/.title: Type 97 ChiHa in Malaya
/projects/ija/type97/malaya1941/.summary: A Type 97 Chi-Ha チハ roaring down the Malayan peninsula in 1941. This is the old Airfix 1:76 kit with a couple of infantry figures, echoing a pretty well-known picture. No electronics in this one.

/projects/spitfire/prxix/.title: Spitfire PR Mk.XIX
/projects/spitfire/prxix/.summary: Building the Supermarine Spitfire PR.XIX in 1:72 from the Airfix D-Day Duo kit. No electronics in this one.

/projects/ija/type95/onbetio/.title: Betio
/projects/ija/type95/onbetio/.summary: Type 95 Ha-Gō on Betio, capturing the aftermath of the battle as depicted in a famous photograph. Uses the IBG Models 1:72 kit. No electronics.

/projects/spain/polikarpovi16/.title: I-16 Escuadrilla de Mosca
/projects/spain/polikarpovi16/.summary: Building the beautiful ClearProp 1:72 rendering of the Polikarpov I-16 in Spanish Republican Air Force service in the Escuadrilla de Mosca. No electronics.

/projects/napoleonic/britishgunner1815/.title: British Royal Artillery Gunner 1815
/projects/napoleonic/britishgunner1815/.summary: Posing the Elan13 54mm Royal Artillery Gunner leaping into action... (no electronics in this one)

/projects/plaaf/jl8/.title: Hongdu K-8/JL-8
/projects/plaaf/jl8/.summary: Building the Hongdu K-8/JL-8 trainer aircraft from the Trumpeter 1:72 kit. No electronics in this one.

/projects/ija/mitsubishiki51/ki51burma/.title: キ51 over Burma 1942
/projects/ija/mitsubishiki51/ki51burma/.summary: Building the ClearProp Ki-51 Sonia 1:144 with a motorized prop and a camo scheme as used in Burma 1942

/projects/ija/kawasakiki100/ki100itype5/.title: Kawasaki Ki-100-I-Otsu
/projects/ija/kawasakiki100/ki100itype5/.summary: Building the キ100 from Aoshima in 1:72, mounted in flight over a watercolour scene. No electronics in this one.

/projects/bluestar/southlandstar/.title: M.V. Southland Star
/projects/bluestar/southlandstar/.summary: Blue Star Lines M.V. Southland Star transiting Cook Strait in a gale

/projects/france/moranesaulnier/ms230/.title: Morane Saulnier MS.230
/projects/france/moranesaulnier/ms230/.summary: Building the Dora Wings Morane Saulnier MS.230 for the 2024 Models for Heroes 48x48 group build.

/projects/raf/gloster/gladiator/.title: Gloster Gladiator
/projects/raf/gloster/gladiator/.summary: Building the Airfix 1:72 Gloster Gladiator Mk II over St. Inglevert, Northern France, December 1939. No electronics in this one.

/projects/raf/bristol/bulldog/.title: Bristol Bulldog
/projects/raf/bristol/bulldog/.summary: The Bristol Bulldog is an RAF classic from the inter-war period. Although this Airfix Vintage Classic 2019 boxing was tooled way back in 1969, it is still a very buildable kit of a very beautiful plane.

/projects/ijn/tone/.title: IJN Heavy Cruiser Tone 利根
/projects/ijn/tone/.summary: On 23 January 1942, the IJN Heavy Cruiser Tone 利根 attacked Buka Island with its float planes. A diorama featuring the Aoshima 1:700 kit.

/projects/france/caudronrenault/cr714/.title: CR.714
/projects/france/caudronrenault/cr714/.summary: Building the DoraWings Caudron-Renault CR.714 with a little Christmas Spirit. No electronics in this one.

/projects/royalnavy/forcez/electraandexp.title: Electra And Express To the Rescue
/projects/royalnavy/forcez/electraandexp.summary: HMS Electra (H27) and HMS Express (H61) race to protect HMS Prince of Wales and HMS Repulse as a wave of G3M Nell torpedo bombers press their attack on 10 December 1941. No electronics in this one.

/projects/ija/kawasakiki10/.title: Kawasaki Ki-10
/projects/ija/kawasakiki10/.summary: Building the ICM Kawasaki Ki-10. No electronics in this one.

/projects/raf/hurricane/mki/.title: Hurricane MkI
/projects/raf/hurricane/mki/.summary: No. 501 Squadron RAF over Dover in August 1940. Depicted with the Arma Hobby 1:72 kit and a Pit-Road 1:700 wingmen. No electronics in this one.

/projects/ija/nakajimaki43-ii/.title: Nakajima Ki43-II
/projects/ija/nakajimaki43-ii/.summary: Nakajima Ki-43 Hayabusa (隼), doing what peregrine falcons do best. the Hasegawa 1:72 kit paired with a Pit-Road B-17, pictures somewhere over New Guinea in 1943.

/projects/dehavilland/beaver/.title: DHC Beaver
/projects/dehavilland/beaver/.summary: Building the de Havilland Canada DHC-2 Beaver in-flight and motorized, based on the Airfix Vintage Classics kit A03017V.

/projects/ija/nakajimaki27/.title: Nakajima Ki-27
/projects/ija/nakajimaki27/.summary: Building the ICM Nakajima Ki-27a kit in 1:72 scale (no electronics in this one)

/projects/japan/yanmar/yh6115/.title: YANMAR Rice Harvester YH6115 オートコンバイン
/projects/japan/yanmar/yh6115/.summary: Building the Hasegawa 1:35 kit of the YANMAR YH6115 Rice Harvester, and spending a lot of time watching youtube videos of the machine while *planting rice* in a dio! (no electronics in this one)

/projects/japan/honda/supercub/.title: Honda Super Cub
/projects/japan/honda/supercub/.summary: Building the F-Toys Honda Super Cub in 1:24

/projects/ijn/mitsubishia6m/a6m2n/ftoysf.title: Mitsubishi A6M2-N
/projects/ijn/mitsubishia6m/a6m2n/ftoysf.summary: Building the F-Toys Mitsubishi A6M2-N from their 1/144 WORK SHOP Vol.40

/projects/ija/kawasakiki61/ki61ii/.title: Kawasaki Ki-61-II
/projects/ija/kawasakiki61/ki61ii/.summary: Building the F-Toys Ki-61-II from Wing Kit Collection 18 in 1:144

/projects/hidf/twinotter/.title: HIDF Twin Otter Recon/SpecOps
/projects/hidf/twinotter/.summary: DHC-6 Twin Otter from Revell (04901 in 1:72), as seen commandeered by HIDF Gendarmerie and pressed into service as a reconnaissance and special ops platform. For the Micro Machines Podcast HIDF GB.

/projects/defiantmkivdo17z/.title: Defiant v Do-17z
/projects/defiantmkivdo17z/.summary: Aces High! A Boulton Paul Defiant Mk.I bringing down a Dornier Do-17z 'flying pencil', built with the Airfix 1:72 kits from 2014. No electronics.

/projects/ukraine/fencer/.title: Ukrainian Su-24M Fencer
/projects/ukraine/fencer/.summary: Building the Armory 1:144 representation of the Ukrainian Su-24M Fencer. No electronics in this one.

/projects/ijn/militarytransports/.title: IJN Military Transports
/projects/ijn/militarytransports/.summary: Building the No.1 and No.101 landing ships 輸送艦 from the Tamiya Military Transport set. No electronics or base for this - saving for a future diorama.

/projects/tarpchallenge/snowyfindsaride/.title: Snowy Finds a Ride
/projects/tarpchallenge/snowyfindsaride/.summary: My Hergé fanfic for the @justmakingconversation Great Tarp Build featuring the Dora Wings Percival Proctor & Vega Gull in 1:72 (no electronics in this one)

/projects/ukraine/usv/.title: Ukraine's Maritime Drone (USV)
/projects/ukraine/usv/.summary: Building the MikroMir 1:35 kit. No electronics in this one.

/projects/japan/dauphin2/.title: Aérospatiale SA365N Dauphin 2
/projects/japan/dauphin2/.summary: Building the Aérospatiale SA365N Dauphin 2 as used by the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. Trumpeter 1:48 kit, no electronics.

/projects/ija/type89igootsu/.title: IJA Type 89 I-Go Otsu Medium Tank
/projects/ija/type89igootsu/.summary: Building the IBG Models 1:72 representation of the IJA Type 89 I-Go Otsu Medium Tank. No electronics in this one.

/projects/jsdf/f-4ej/.title: F-4EJ Last Phantom
/projects/jsdf/f-4ej/.summary: Building the 2019 commemorative scheme of the JASDF F-4EJ Kai Phantom II - a beautiful little Platz 1:144 kit. No electronics in this one.

/projects/ija/racetojitra/.title: Race To Jitra
/projects/ija/racetojitra/.summary: Building a double-sided box diorama in mixed scales to capture the rapid advance of Japanese forces during the Invasion of Malaya. The Battle of Jitra was one of many engagements where the advancing force overwhelmed the under-prepared defenders on the peninsula.

/projects/ija/type95/type95hago/.title: IJA Type 95 Ha-Go Light Tank
/projects/ija/type95/type95hago/.summary: Building the IBG Models 1:72 representation of the IJA Type 95 Ha-Gō ハ号 Light Tank. No electronics in this one.

/projects/pla/t34-85/.title: The Legendary T-34/85 215号
/projects/pla/t34-85/.summary: Capturing the legendary T-34/85 215号 in action, using the Rye Field Model kit RM-5059 in 1:35 and some great resin figures from YUFAN Model. No electronics in this one.

/projects/ukraine/bayraktartb2/.title: Bayraktar TB2
/projects/ukraine/bayraktartb2/.summary: Building the Clear Prop! 1:48 representation of the now iconic Bayraktar TB2 as used by the Armed Forces of Ukraine

/projects/ijn/ayanami/.title: IJN Destroyer Ayanami
/projects/ijn/ayanami/.summary: Building the Tamiya 1:700 representation of the IJN Destroyer Ayanami 綾波

/projects/ija/nakajimaki84/.title: Nakajima Ki84
/projects/ija/nakajimaki84/.summary: Building the Arma Hobby 1:72 representation of the Nakajima Ki-84 Hayate (キ84 疾風)

/projects/ijn/hashidate/.title: IJN Hashidate
/projects/ijn/hashidate/.summary: Building the Tamiya 1:700 kit of the IJN Gunboat Hashidate 橋立

/projects/ijn/mitsubishia6m/sweet14110/.title: Mitsubishi A6M Zero on the Zuikaku
/projects/ijn/mitsubishia6m/sweet14110/.summary: Building the amazing little Sweet 1:144 kit of the Zero with Flight Deck

/projects/britisharmy/tilly10hp/.title: Austin Tilly 10HP
/projects/britisharmy/tilly10hp/.summary: Buidling a fantastic little 1:72 Austin Tilly 10hp from ACE Models of Ukraine. No electronics in this one - just a quick weekend build.

/projects/ija/nakajimaki84/eggscale/.title: Nakajima Ki-84 Egg-Scale
/projects/ija/nakajimaki84/eggscale/.summary: An egg-scale warm up before I move on to the Arma Hobby Ki-84 Hayate

/projects/raf/gloster/pioneere.28-39/.title: Gloster Pioneer E.28-39
/projects/raf/gloster/pioneere.28-39/.summary: Building the Gloster Pioneer E.28-39 from Clear Prop models of Ukraine

/projects/bellanca/pacemaker/.title: Bellanca CH-300 Pacemaker
/projects/bellanca/pacemaker/.summary: Building the Dora Wings kit of the Bellanca CH-300 Pacemaker with an appropriately? kitsch presentation: Inter Island Airways livery over the beaches of Hawaii.

/projects/ijn/mitsubishia5m2b/.title: Mitsubishi A5M2b
/projects/ijn/mitsubishia5m2b/.summary: Building the Wingsy Kits A5M2b in-flight for the 2023 Model Officers Mess birthday bash raising money and awareness for the Models for Heroes charity.

/projects/walnutchallenge/teddybearvikin.title: Teddy Bear Viking
/projects/walnutchallenge/teddybearvikin.summary: If you go down in the woods today, you're sure of a big surprise ... a Teddy Bear Viking in a Walnut!

/projects/porcorosso/.title: Porco Rosso
/projects/porcorosso/.summary: Revisiting one of my favourite films after so many years thanks to a wonderful 1:72 kit of the Porco Rosso Savoia S.21 from Fine Molds

/projects/raf/mosquito/.title: de Havilland Mosquito B Mk.XVI
/projects/raf/mosquito/.summary: Building the Airfix de Havilland Mosquito B Mk.XVI (no electronics)

/projects/scifiandfantasy/uncfdreadnough.title: U.N.C.F. Dreadnoughts
/projects/scifiandfantasy/uncfdreadnough.summary: Electrifying a pair of Bandai Spirits Dreadnought-class battleships with LED effect and fibre optics

/projects/raf/mosquito/mozziebite/.title: Mozzie Bite!
/projects/raf/mosquito/mozziebite/.summary: A little 1:700 diorama in an epoxy resin paper-weight featuring Pit-Road Mosquito and Tiger I models (no electronics).

/projects/westland/whirlwindhas22/.title: Westland Whirlwind HAS.22
/projects/westland/whirlwindhas22/.summary: Building the Westland Whirlwind HAS.22 from Airfix (no electronics in this one)

/projects/france/bleriotxi/.title: Blériot XI
/projects/france/bleriotxi/.summary: Making a Blériot XI keeper of the spare keys - an Aerobase kit from Japan encased in epoxy resin (no electronics).

/projects/ijn/yawatamaruunyo/.title: Yawatamaru / Un'yō
/projects/ijn/yawatamaruunyo/.summary: Using a Pepper's Ghost effect in a box diorama to capture the Yawatamaru (八幡丸) conversion to Taiyō-class escort carrier Un'yō (雲鷹).

/projects/ukraine/inspring/.title: In Spring
/projects/ukraine/inspring/.summary: Perhaps my final build for 2022. Fittingly, figures from MasterBox of Ukraine, in a diorama that attempts to capture my greatest hope for what will come in the new year.. (no electronics)

/projects/poland/wz34/.title: wz. 34
/projects/poland/wz34/.summary: Building the Polish Samochód pancerny wz. 34 from the 1:35 Mirage Hobby kit, with some figures from MiniArt: The Lost Christmas

/projects/soviet/victoriii/.title: Empire in Decay - Victor III
/projects/soviet/victoriii/.summary: A Soviet Victor III tied up to a wharf and left to decay in the toxic sludge ... modelled from the Dragon 1:700 kit (no electronics in this one)

/projects/plaaf/j20/.title: J-20
/projects/plaaf/j20/.summary: Building the Trumpeter 1:144 kit of the Chengdu J-20 fifth-generation fighter of the PLAAF (no electronics here, just a great little kit)

/projects/ija/mitsubishiki46/.title: Mitsubishi Ki-46 Trainer
/projects/ija/mitsubishiki46/.summary: Building a SG$5 bargain ARII 1:72 kit of the Mitsubishi Ki-46-II Dinah Trainer (no electronics)

/projects/plan/type051c/.title: PLAN Type 051C
/projects/plan/type051c/.summary: Building the PLAN Type 051C destroyer DDG 115 沈阳 (Shenyang) with a little LED illumination.

/projects/axisofchess/.title: Axis Of Chess
/projects/axisofchess/.summary: Welcome to Axis of Chess, my little excuse for using up a bunch of spare Pit-Road 1:700 vehicles. No electronics in this one.

/projects/poland/pmw/orpslazak/.title: ORP Ślązak
/projects/poland/pmw/orpslazak/.summary: Building the ORP Ślązak Hunt-class destroyer in 1:700 scale in a Baltic Winter Patrol setting. My first venture into IBG ship kits - no electronics here, just a very fine kit experience.

/projects/ijn/tachikawakky1/.title: Tachikawa KKY-1
/projects/ijn/tachikawakky1/.summary: Building the rare Tachikawa KKY1 from Ukrainian model company Amodel. No electronics in this one.

/projects/concorde/.title: Concorde
/projects/concorde/.summary: Last flight of the Concorde - the Airfix 1:114 with LED effects in 1970s travel-agent chic

/projects/p40/warhawk40k/.title: WarHawk 40K
/projects/p40/warhawk40k/.summary: Taking the Airfix 1:72 Curtiss Warhawk in a slightly unusual direction, with LED effects driven by a CD4060 ripple counter

/projects/strv103/.title: Stridsvagn 103
/projects/strv103/.summary: Practicing some hull-down diorama effects with the Swedish Stridsvagn 103 using the Trumpeter 1:72 kit (no electronics)

/projects/raaf/boomerang/.title: CA-19 Boomerang
/projects/raaf/boomerang/.summary: Building the Special Hobby 1:72 RAAF CA-19 Boomerang, as stationed in New Britain 1945 (no electronics)

/projects/p40/eggscale/.title: Flying Tigers Egg-Scale
/projects/p40/eggscale/.summary: Building the Tiger Model egg-scale P-40 so it can join its 1:72 and 1:144 Brothers in Arms (no electronics in this one)

/projects/royalnavy/hmsrevenges27/.title: HMS Revenge
/projects/royalnavy/hmsrevenges27/.summary: HMS Revenge heading out from Faslane on patrol - an attempt at capturing the distinctive wake of a sub cruising on the surface. Dragon 1:700 kit.

/projects/ijn/no13subchaser/.title: IJN No.13 Sub-chaser
/projects/ijn/no13subchaser/.summary: IJN No.13 class submarine chaser 第十三号型駆潜艇 on a quiet island patrol

/projects/japan/daihatsumidget/.title: Daihatsu Midget
/projects/japan/daihatsumidget/.summary: Building the iconic 1957 Daihatsu Midget DMK from a Micro Ace/Arii kit with some scratch modifications. No electronics in this one.

/projects/poland/pzl/ts-11/.title: TS-11 Iskra
/projects/poland/pzl/ts-11/.summary: Building the beautiful Arma Hobby 1:72 PZL TS-11 Iskra. No electronics in this one, just enjoying the build.

/projects/mongolwarriors/.title: Mongol Warriors
/projects/mongolwarriors/.summary: Using select 1:72 figures from HäT set 8298 to make a little diorama in an Ikea picture frame with LED lighting

/projects/p40/afvclub68/.title: P-40B Flying Tiger in 1:144
/projects/p40/afvclub68/.summary: Improving the already well-detailed 1:144 AFV Club Flying Tigers P-40B with a scratch built cockpit (no electronics in this one)

/projects/p40/flyingtigers/.title: P-40B Flying Tiger in 1:72
/projects/p40/flyingtigers/.summary: Building the most excellent Airfix P-40B H81-A2 1:72 in Flying Tigers livery (no electronics in this one)

/projects/raf/fairey/gannet/.title: Fairey Gannet
/projects/raf/fairey/gannet/.summary: Building the most beautifully ugly Fairey Gannet from the Trumpeter 1:72 kit (no electronics in this one)

/projects/ija/tachikawaki55/.title: Tachikawa Ki-55
/projects/ija/tachikawaki55/.summary: Building a SG$5 bargain Fujimi 1:72 kit of the Tachikawa Ki-55 Type 99 Advanced Trainer (no electronics in this one)

/projects/walnutchallenge/cossack/.title: Ukrainian Cossack
/projects/walnutchallenge/cossack/.summary: An heroic pose in a walnut with a figure from the Orion Ukrainian Mounted Cossacks set. No, this is not  meant to be political - but if you come and try to steal my nuts, expect to fight this guy! (no electronics in this one)

/projects/ijn/fubuki/.title: Fubuki
/projects/ijn/fubuki/.summary: Building the Japanese destroyer Fubuki (吹雪, 1927) from a beautifully detailed 1:700 Yamashita Hobby kit with Tetra Model Works PE

/projects/royalnavy/hmssheffield/.title: HMS Sheffield
/projects/royalnavy/hmssheffield/.summary: Reproducing a famous photograph of the fire-fighting efforts aboard the HMS Sheffield after is was hit by an Exocet on 4 May 1982

/projects/spitfire/xiv/.title: Spitfire Mk.XIV
/projects/spitfire/xiv/.summary: Building the beautiful candy red G-Fire Spitfire Mk.XIV from Airfix in 1:48 scale. No electronics in this one.

/projects/walnutchallenge/overboard/.title: Man Overboard
/projects/walnutchallenge/overboard/.summary: A little 1:700 diorama in a walnut featuring a little drama while mooring a Mitsubishi F1M2 observation seaplane. Part of the Just Making Conversation podcast Walnut Challenge group build. No electronics in this one.

/projects/ijn/nakajimab5n2/.title: Nakajima B5N2 Kate
/projects/ijn/nakajimab5n2/.summary: Building the Airfix 1:72 Nakajima B5N2 Kate - an exercise in weathering, no electronics.

/projects/spitfire/vc/.title: Spitfire Mk.Vc
/projects/spitfire/vc/.summary: Building a diorama inspired by the box-art of Airfix's 1:72 scale Spitfire Mk.Vc flying over La Sénia Algeria 1942, enhanced with some LED candle effects and targets of opportunity.

/projects/westland/lynx/.title: Westland Lynx
/projects/westland/lynx/.summary: Building the Royal Navy Westland Lynx HAS.3 from HobbyBoss (no electronics in this one)

/projects/britisharmy/vauxhalldtypeambul.title: Vauxhall D-Type Ambulance
/projects/britisharmy/vauxhalldtypeambul.summary: Building the wonderful little 1:72 Vauxhall D-Type Ambulance kit from Ukrainian manufacturer Roden. Dedicated to the memory of Valery Grygorenko. Valery created some of the most amazing box art for Roden but tragically he was killed in a Russian attack near his home in March 2022.

/projects/royalnavy/buccaneer/.title: Blackburn Buccaneer S.2C
/projects/royalnavy/buccaneer/.summary: An excuse to build another sea base - this time for an aircraft - the RN Blackburn Buccaneer S.2C from Airfix in 1:72 scale, tooling around the North Sea at 30ft.

/projects/raaf/wirraway/.title: Wirraway
/projects/raaf/wirraway/.summary: Building the Special Hobby 1:72 CAC Wirraway, as stationed at Seletar in 1941 - just up the road from me (no electronics)

/projects/soviet/t34-1942/.title: T34 1942
/projects/soviet/t34-1942/.summary: Building the Trumpeter 1:72 T-34 Model 1942 with some CMK figures (no electronics - just practicing weathering at small scale)

/projects/walnutchallenge/kubelmagic/.title: KubelMagic
/projects/walnutchallenge/kubelmagic/.summary: A walnut, Brengun 1:144 Kübelwagen and a miniaturised SMD version of a BJT oscillator - and with a bit of practice, some close-up model magic.

/projects/plaaf/j10s/.title: Chengdu J-10S
/projects/plaaf/j10s/.summary: Building the Trumpeter 1:72 Chengdu J-10S in early Ba Yi Aerobatics Team colours. No electronics in this one.

/projects/soviet/polikarpov/i-153/.title: I-153
/projects/soviet/polikarpov/i-153/.summary: Building the Polikarpov I-153 as used by the Guomindang Air Force - ICM 1:72 kit 72076

/projects/royalnavy/forcez/hmsprinceofwa.title: HMS Prince Of Wales
/projects/royalnavy/forcez/hmsprinceofwa.summary: Remembering Force Z with a build of the HMS Prince Of Wales from the Tamiya 1:700 waterline series. No electronics for this one.

/projects/tornadoecr/.title: Tornado ECR
/projects/tornadoecr/.summary: Building the 1:144 Tornado ECR from Revell with wireless LEDs in the Tailpipe.

/projects/thatisnotatoy/.title: That is not a toy, my boy!
/projects/thatisnotatoy/.summary: A somewhat unconventional diorama featuring an Airfix 1:35 M7 Priest, some MasterBox figures and a bonsai tree!

/projects/plaaf/jf17/.title: JF-17
/projects/plaaf/jf17/.summary: Buidling the JF-17 Thunder with the striking livery it sported during the 2007 Pakistan Day Joint Services Parade. No electronics in this one.

/projects/poland/pzl/p7a/.title: PZL P.7a
/projects/poland/pzl/p7a/.summary: Building the Arma Hobby PZL P.7a 1:72 expert set.  No electronics added - just enjoying this wonderfully detailed kit.

/projects/britisharmy/firefly/.title: Firefly
/projects/britisharmy/firefly/.summary: Practicing finishing techniques on the Airfix 1:72 Sherman Firefly, then animating the turret with some ATtiny85 magic

/projects/royalnavy/forcez/hmasvampire/.title: HMAS Vampire
/projects/royalnavy/forcez/hmasvampire/.summary: Remembering Force Z with a build of the HMAS Vampire from the Tamiya 1:700 waterline series. No electronics for this one.

/projects/scifiandfantasy/redeyespacemar.title: The Red Eyed Space Marine
/projects/scifiandfantasy/redeyespacemar.summary: Inspired by all the mad miniature skills out there these days, I delve into the world of space marines with eyes that glow - no wires or batteries

/projects/ijn/kawanishik5y1/.title: Kawanishi K5Y1 Tensegrity Stand
/projects/ijn/kawanishik5y1/.summary: Experimenting with tensegrity model mounting, using as a subject the ARII 1:72 Kawanishi K5Y1 赤とんぼ (Willow)

/projects/ijn/i16i58/.title: I-16 and I-58
/projects/ijn/i16i58/.summary: Building the Tamiya 1:700 I-16 and I-58 waterline kit 31453. No electronics in this one - more an experiment in rust and water effects.

/projects/britisharmy/25pdr/.title: 25 Pounder Field Gun and Quad
/projects/britisharmy/25pdr/.summary: Building the Airfix 1:76 scale 25 Pounder Field Gun and Quad A01305. No electronics in this one yet.

/projects/scifiandfantasy/tydiriumstrobe.title: Tydirium Strobe Module
/projects/scifiandfantasy/tydiriumstrobe.summary: Packaging the ATtiny85 Lambda-class shuttle Tydirium navigation strobe circuit as a small board that can be added to an existing lighting setup.

/projects/royalnavy/tigermoth/.title: Tiger Moth
/projects/royalnavy/tigermoth/.summary: Royal Navy Fleet Air Arm Tiger Moth XL717 heading out over the rocky shors near Abbotsinch, Scotland - a small vignette featuring the Airfix De Havilland DH.82a Tiger Moth 1:72 A02106 with a custom motorised propeller

/projects/scifiandfantasy/tydiriumstrobe.title: Tydirium Strobe
/projects/scifiandfantasy/tydiriumstrobe.summary: Figuring out the navigation light strobe frequency of the Lambda-class shuttle Tydirium and building a freeform circuit sculpture to demonstrate the effects (running an ATtiny85 on 3V)

/projects/plaaf/nanchangy5/.title: Nanchang Y-5
/projects/plaaf/nanchangy5/.summary: A simple build of the Antonov An-2 Colt/Nanchang Y-5 1:72 model 01602 from Trumpeter. I've spied opportunities for electronics in this kit but not added any yet.

/projects/wehrmacht/schnellboot/.title: Schnellboot
/projects/wehrmacht/schnellboot/.summary: Building the Bronco NB5004 1/350 German S-100 Class Schnellboot with a dockside diorama with LED effects

/projects/plan/type054a/.title: PLA Navy Type 054A
/projects/plan/type054a/.summary: Building the Trumpeter 1:700 PLAN 054A Frigate (no electronics - yet)

/projects/poland/rwd8dwl/.title: RWD-8 DWL
/projects/poland/rwd8dwl/.summary: A simple build of the RWD-8 DWL Polish trainer 1:72 kit 72502 from IBG Models (no electronics - yet)

/projects/pla/ca30fueltransporter/.title: Jie Fang CA-30 Fuel Truck
/projects/pla/ca30fueltransporter/.summary: A simple build of the 解放 Jie Fang CA-30 Fuel Transporter 1:72 model 01104 from Trumpeter (no electronics - yet).

/projects/raf/typhoon/.title: Hawker Typhoon
/projects/raf/typhoon/.summary: Building the Airfix 1:72 Hawker Typhoon Mk.Ib, electrifying it with an engine and rocket effects and displaying it with a ground attack vignette

/projects/japan/yatairamendoorbell/.title: 屋台ラーメン The Yatai Ramen Doorbell
/projects/japan/yatairamendoorbell/.summary: A wireless doorbell based on an Arii (Microace) Yatai Ramen model with added lights and sound

/projects/hurstpointlighthouse/.title: Hurst Point Lighthouse
/projects/hurstpointlighthouse/.summary: Building the wonderful Paper Shipwright model of the historic Hurst Point Lighthouse, and bringing it to life with a Fl(4) W 15s LED array

/projects/raf/harriergr1/.title: Harrier GR.1
/projects/raf/harriergr1/.summary: Building the Airfix 1:72 Hawker Siddeley Harrier GR.1, electrifying it with lights and engine sounds and putting it in a cold war forward deployment diorama (somewhere in a German forest circa 1970)

/projects/electronicart/aircraftnavigati.title: Freeform Popsicle Airways
/projects/electronicart/aircraftnavigati.summary: Demonstrating a simple aircraft navigation beacon sequence implemented with a couple of 555 timers

/projects/electronicart/pollen8/.title: Pollen8
/projects/electronicart/pollen8/.summary: a freeform wire sculpture with LEDs driven by a light-sensitive 555/4017 counter circuit

/projects/goldenhind/.title: GoldenHind
/projects/goldenhind/.summary: building a mini metal model of the Golden Hind

/projects/electronicart/wyled/.title: WyLed
/projects/electronicart/wyled/.summary: .. when you allow an exploration of a chip (TM1638) to get a little out of hand! The WyLed free-form sculpture reacts to sound and blinks a 4-digit LED display. An ATTiny85 provides a little brain, and the TM1638 handles all input and output.

/projects/electronicart/glowball/.title: GlowBall
/projects/electronicart/glowball/.summary: building LED effects for a Glass Eye Studio Celestial Planet Weight

/projects/spain/sagradafamilia/.title: Sagrada Família
/projects/spain/sagradafamilia/.summary: a paper model with some LED effects

/projects/electronicart/metalearthleadgu.title: Metal Earth Lead Guitar
/projects/electronicart/metalearthleadgu.summary: Pimping up the Metal Earth Electric Lead Guitar kit with some sound activated LEDs with electronics squirreled away in an 'amp'
